item.title: By: Bruce Elgort

item.description: <p>Setting ini variables is archaic. I agree with Nathan.</p>

item.title: By: Nathan T. Freeman
item.dc:creator: Nathan T. Freeman
item.description: <p>The fact that this question has been asked and answered probably in excess of 100 times is indicative of just how much DESIGNER NEEDS PREFERENCE CONTROLS!!!</p>
item.content:encoded: The fact that this question has been asked and answered probably in excess of 100 times is indicative of just how much DESIGNER NEEDS PREFERENCE CONTROLS!!!
